original_text: This woman did what she was able to do. She poured oil over my body. So now, my body will be ready for people to bury me.
korean_text: 그는 힘을 다하여 내 몸에 향유를 부어 내 장례를 미리 준비하였느니라

sentences.original_text: This woman did what she was able to do
sentences.korean_translation: 이 여자는 자신이 할 수 있는 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: She poured oil over my body
